org.onexus.collection.api

Interface ICollectionStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    H2CollectionStore, MysqlCollectionStore, SqlCollectionStore

    public interface ICollectionStore

    A ICollectionStore persist a Collection and runs a Query on it.

    Author:
    Jordi Deu-Pons

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deregister(ORI collectionOri)
      Remove the collection from the store.
      List<String> getRegistered() 
      void insert(IEntity entity)
      Insert one entity.
      void insert(IEntitySet dataSet)
      Insert a entity set.
      boolean isRegistered(ORI collectionOri)
      Check if a collection is registered in this store.
      IEntityTable load(Query query)
      Query the store
      void register(ORI collectionOri)
      Prepare the store to be able to insert entities of this collection.

    • Method Detail

      • isRegistered

        boolean isRegistered(ORI collectionOri)
        Check if a collection is registered in this store.
        Parameters:
        collectionOri - The Collection URI.
        Returns:
        Returns true if it's stored and false if not.

      • register

        void register(ORI collectionOri)
        Prepare the store to be able to insert entities of this collection.
        Parameters:
        collectionOri - The Collection URI

      • deregister

        void deregister(ORI collectionOri)
        Remove the collection from the store.
        Parameters:
        collectionOri -

      • getRegistered

        List<String> getRegistered()
        Returns:
        A list with all the registered collections URIs

      • insert

        void insert(IEntity entity)
        Insert one entity.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity to be inserted

      • insert

        void insert(IEntitySet dataSet)
        Insert a entity set.
        Parameters:
        dataSet - The entity set to be inserted

      • load

        IEntityTable load(Query query)
        Query the store
        Parameters:
        query - The Query of interest
        Returns:
        The result IEntityTable for the query.
